content: project is really difficult plus i wanted people to see my pattern writing style as i m new to this i can totally understand people not wanting to spend their hard earned money on my patterns without knowing anything about my writing style so hopefully these freebies will give you all a little insight also i wanted to make some simple colourwork patterns that were accessible to everyone i have learnt a lot of my knitting skills from free patterns so i wanted to give something back to this wonderful community
